Book With Me - Angular, Express, MongoDB

← Back

Book With Me is a MEAN stack development project, created with Angular7 and Express4.16.4, mongoose5.4.5.

Book With Me describes a Rental System for booking Bed&Breakfast places all over the world, it is an airbnb-like system.

Languages, Frameworks

Angular 7, Express, mongoose: MongoDB database ODM

Used Libraries

Design: Bootstrap 4, font-awesome, moment,
ngx-toastr, ng2-daterangepicker, ngx-pipes
Authentication: jwt, bcrypt

General functionality

Authenticate users via JWT
Every authenticated user can:
create rental-place and delete it
book a rental-place for chosen dates (free dates)
user cannot book his own rental-places

General functionality

Every authenticated user can:
manage and display his own places and bookings
Not authenticated users can:
display all rentals' list and rental-detail page
App can display success and error messages
